Class Hierarchy
This inheritance list is sorted roughly, but not completely, alphabetically:
[detail level 1234]
 ▼CAtomIndexTypeMapperBase class for mapping between type indices
 CFileAtomMapperMap atom types based on provided file
 CSubsetAtomMapperMap atom types onto a provided subset
 ▼CAtomTyperBase class for all atom typers
 ▼CAtomIndexTyperBase class for generating numerical types along with atomic radius
 CCallbackIndexTyperUse user-provided callback to do typing Must provide the number of types and their names
 CElementIndexTyperCalculate element types
 CGninaIndexTyperCalculate gnina types
 CMappedAtomIndexTyper< Mapper, Typer >Wrap an atom typer with a mapper
 CNullIndexTyperAlways return an invalid type
 ▼CMappedAtomIndexTyper< FileAtomMapper, ElementIndexTyper >
 CFileMappedElementTyperFile mapping element types, derived class for convenient initialization
 ▼CMappedAtomIndexTyper< FileAtomMapper, GninaIndexTyper >
 CFileMappedGninaTyperFile mapping element types, derived class for convenient initialization
 ▼CMappedAtomIndexTyper< SubsetAtomMapper, ElementIndexTyper >
 CSubsettedElementTyperSubsetting element types, derived class for convenient initialization
 ▼CMappedAtomIndexTyper< SubsetAtomMapper, GninaIndexTyper >
 CSubsettedGninaTyperSubsetting gnina types, derived class for convenient initialization
 ▼CAtomVectorTyperBase class for generating vector types
 CCallbackVectorTyperUse user-provided callback to do vector typing Must provide the number of types and their names
 CGninaVectorTyperDecompose gnina types into elements and properties. Result is boolean
 CCartesianGrid< G >Wrapper around grid of type G that imposes Cartesian coordinates. Includes center and resolution and supports (eventually) interpolation
 CCoordCacheLoad and cache molecular coordinates and atom types
 CCoordinateSetA collection of typed atomic coordinates
 CExampleA single example represented by its typed coordinates and label(s)
 CExampleExtractorConverts an ExampleRef to and Example Loads (potentially cached) data and applies atom typers to create coordinate sets. Takes care of in-memory caching (optional) and also supports memory mapped gnina cache files (incurring slight overhead on recalculation of atom types in exchange for substantially less real mem usage)
 CExampleProviderGiven a file of examples, provide Example classes one at a time This contains an exampleref provider, which can be configured using a single settings object if so desired, and an example extractor
 CExampleProviderSettings
 CExampleRefA reference to a single example - the parsed line. This is distinct from an Example to enable out-of-core training (although the default should be to load all examples into memory)
 ▼CExampleRefProviderAbstract class for storing training example references
 CBalancedExampleRefProviderSample uniformly from actives and decoys
 CGroupedExampleRefProvider< Provider >Group multiple grids into a single example For example, multiple frames of an MD simulation that will be processed by an RNN. next() returns the next frame for the next example in the batch; traversal is row-major with layout TxN. Frames are maintained in the order they are added. There is a fixed batch and time series (group) size
 CReceptorStratifiedExampleRefProvider< Provider, K >Partition examples by receptor and sample k times uniformly from each receptor with k=2 and a balanced_provider you get paired examples from each receptor
 CSamplingExampleRefProvider< Provider1, Provider2 >Sample with some specified probability between two providers that should already be initialized
 CUniformExampleRefProviderSingle array of examples, possibly shuffled
 CValueStratifiedExampleRefProfider< Provider >Partition examples by affinity and sample uniformly from each affinity bin affinities are binned by absolute value according to molgriddataparameters
 CGrid< Dtype, NumDims, isCUDA >
 CGrid< Dtype, 1, isCUDA >
 CGrid< Dtype, NumDims, false >
 CGrid< Dtype, NumDims, true >
 CGridMaker
 CGninaIndexTyper::info
 ▼CManagedGridBase< Dtype, NumDims >ManagedGrid base class
 CManagedGrid< Dtype, NumDims >A dense grid whose memory is managed by the class
 ▼CManagedGridBase< Dtype, 1 >
 CManagedGrid< Dtype, 1 >
 Cmgrid_buffer_data< Dtype >
 CQuaternionA CUDA friendly quaternion class. Single precision only for maximum CUDA performance
 CStringCache
 CTransformStateful transformation of Cartesian coordinates
